00027 void SCTPAssociation::recordCwndUpdate(SCTPPathVariables* path)
00028 {
00029     path->statisticsPathSSthresh->record(path->ssthresh);
00030     path->statisticsPathCwnd->record(path->cwnd);
00031 }

00035 
00036 void SCTPAssociation::initCCParameters(SCTPPathVariables* path)
00037 {
00038         path->cwnd = (int32)min(4 * path->pmtu, max(2 * path->pmtu, 4380));
00039     path->ssthresh = state->peerRwnd;
00040     recordCwndUpdate(path);
00041 
00042     sctpEV3 << simTime() << ":\tCC [initCCParameters]\t" << path->remoteAddress
00043               << "\tsst=" << path->ssthresh << " cwnd=" << path->cwnd << endl;
00044 }

00046 
00047 void SCTPAssociation::cwndUpdateAfterSack()
00048 {
00049     for (SCTPPathMap::iterator iter = sctpPathMap.begin(); iter != sctpPathMap.end(); iter++) {
00050         SCTPPathVariables* path = iter->second;
00051         if(path->fastRecoveryActive == false) {
00052 
00053             // ====== Retransmission required -> reduce congestion window ======
00054             if(path->requiresRtx) {
00055                 double decreaseFactor = 0.5;
00056 
00057                       sctpEV3 << simTime() << ":\tCC [cwndUpdateAfterSack]\t" << path->remoteAddress
00058                                  << "\tsst=" << path->ssthresh << " cwnd=" << path->cwnd;
00059 
00060                       path->ssthresh = max((int32)path->cwnd - (int32)rint(decreaseFactor * (double)path->cwnd),
00061                                                   4 * (int32)path->pmtu);
00062                       path->cwnd = path->ssthresh;
00063 
00064                       sctpEV3 << "\t=>\tsst=" << path->ssthresh << " cwnd=" << path->cwnd << endl;
00065                  recordCwndUpdate(path);
00066                  path->partialBytesAcked = 0;
00067 
00068 
00069                  // ====== Fast Recovery ========================================
00070                  if(state->fastRecoverySupported) {
00071                     uint32 highestAckOnPath = state->lastTsnAck;
00072                     for(SCTPQueue::PayloadQueue::iterator pq = retransmissionQ->payloadQueue.begin();
00073                          pq != retransmissionQ->payloadQueue.end(); pq++) {
00074                          if( (chunkHasBeenAcked(pq->second) == true) &&
00075                               (tsnGt(pq->second->tsn, highestAckOnPath)) &&
00076                               (pq->second->getLastDestinationPath() == path) ) {
00077                              // T.D. 21.11.09: Only take care of TSNs on the same path!
00078                              highestAckOnPath = pq->second->tsn;
00079                          }
00080                     }
00081                     /* this can ONLY become TRUE, when Fast Recovery IS supported */
00082                     path->fastRecoveryActive         = true;
00083                     path->fastRecoveryExitPoint  = highestAckOnPath;
00084                     path->fastRecoveryEnteringTime = simTime();
00085 
00086                     sctpEV3 << simTime() << ":\tCC [cwndUpdateAfterSack] Entering Fast Recovery on path "
00087                               << path->remoteAddress
00088                               << ", exit point is " << path->fastRecoveryExitPoint << endl;
00089                 }
00090             }
00091         }
00092         else {
00093             for (SCTPPathMap::iterator iter = sctpPathMap.begin(); iter != sctpPathMap.end(); iter++) {
00094                 SCTPPathVariables* path = iter->second;
00095                 if(path->fastRecoveryActive) {
00096                     sctpEV3 << simTime() << ":\tCC [cwndUpdateAfterSack] Still in Fast Recovery on path "
00097                               << path->remoteAddress
00098                               << ", exit point is " << path->fastRecoveryExitPoint << endl;
00099                 }
00100             }
00101         }
00102     }
00103 }
00104 
00105 
00106 void SCTPAssociation::updateFastRecoveryStatus(const uint32 lastTsnAck)
00107 {
00108     for (SCTPPathMap::iterator iter = sctpPathMap.begin(); iter != sctpPathMap.end(); iter++) {
00109         SCTPPathVariables* path = iter->second;
00110 
00111         if (path->fastRecoveryActive) {
00112             if ( (tsnGt(lastTsnAck, path->fastRecoveryExitPoint)) ||
00113                   (lastTsnAck == path->fastRecoveryExitPoint)
00114             ) {
00115                 path->fastRecoveryActive     = false;
00116                 path->fastRecoveryExitPoint = 0;
00117 
00118                 sctpEV3 << simTime() << ":\tCC [cwndUpdateAfterSack] Leaving Fast Recovery on path "
00119                               << path->remoteAddress
00120                               << ", lastTsnAck=" << lastTsnAck << endl;
00121             }
00122         }
00123     }
00124 }

00126 
00127 void SCTPAssociation::cwndUpdateBytesAcked(SCTPPathVariables* path,
00128                                                          const uint32         ackedBytes,
00129                                                          const bool           ctsnaAdvanced)
00130 {
00131     sctpEV3 << simulation.getSimTime() << "====> cwndUpdateBytesAcked:"
00132               << " path="                     << path->remoteAddress
00133               << " ackedBytes="           << ackedBytes
00134               << " ctsnaAdvanced="        << ((ctsnaAdvanced == true) ? "yes" : "no")
00135               << " cwnd="                     << path->cwnd
00136               << " ssthresh="                 << path->ssthresh
00137               << " ackedBytes="           << ackedBytes
00138               << " pathOsbBeforeUpdate=" << path->outstandingBytesBeforeUpdate
00139               << " pathOsb="                  << path->outstandingBytes
00140               << endl;
00141 
00142     if (path->fastRecoveryActive == false) {
00143         // T.D. 21.11.09: Increasing cwnd is only allowed when not being in
00144         //                      Fast Recovery mode!
00145 
00146         // ====== Slow Start ==================================================
00147         if (path->cwnd <= path->ssthresh)  {
00148             // ------ Clear PartialBytesAcked counter --------------------------
00149             path->partialBytesAcked = 0;
00150 
00151             // ------ Increase Congestion Window -------------------------------
00152             if ((ctsnaAdvanced == true) &&
00153                  (path->outstandingBytesBeforeUpdate >= path->cwnd)) {
00154                     sctpEV3 << simTime() << ":\tCC [cwndUpdateBytesAcked-SlowStart]\t" << path->remoteAddress
00155                               << "\tsst=" << path->ssthresh << " cwnd=" << path->cwnd << " acked=" << ackedBytes;
00156 
00157                     path->cwnd += (int32)min(path->pmtu, ackedBytes);
00158 
00159                     sctpEV3 << "\t=>\tsst=" << path->ssthresh << " cwnd=" << path->cwnd << endl;
00160                 recordCwndUpdate(path);
00161             }
00162 
00163             // ------ No need to increase Congestion Window --------------------
00164             else {
00165                 sctpEV3 << simTime() << ":\tCC "
00166                         << "Not increasing cwnd of path " << path->remoteAddress << " in slow start:\t"
00167                         << "ctsnaAdvanced="       << ((ctsnaAdvanced == true) ? "yes" : "no") << "\t"
00168                         << "cwnd="                    << path->cwnd                              << "\t"
00169                         << "ssthresh="                << path->ssthresh                          << "\t"
00170                         << "ackedBytes="              << ackedBytes                              << "\t"
00171                         << "pathOsbBeforeUpdate=" << path->outstandingBytesBeforeUpdate << "\t"
00172                         << "pathOsb="                 << path->outstandingBytes              << "\t"
00173                         << "(pathOsbBeforeUpdate >= path->cwnd)="
00174                         << (path->outstandingBytesBeforeUpdate >= path->cwnd) << endl;
00175             }
00176         }
00177 
00178         // ====== Congestion Avoidance ========================================
00179         else
00180         {
00181             // ------ Increase PartialBytesAcked counter -----------------------
00182             path->partialBytesAcked += ackedBytes;
00183 
00184             double increaseFactor = 1.0;
00185 
00186             // ------ Increase Congestion Window -------------------------------
00187             if ( (path->partialBytesAcked >= path->cwnd) &&
00188                   (ctsnaAdvanced == true) &&
00189                   (path->outstandingBytesBeforeUpdate >= path->cwnd) ) {
00190                     sctpEV3 << simTime() << ":\tCC [cwndUpdateBytesAcked-CgAvoidance]\t" << path->remoteAddress
00191                               << "\tsst=" << path->ssthresh << " cwnd=" << path->cwnd << " acked=" << ackedBytes;
00192 
00193                     path->cwnd += (int32)rint(increaseFactor * path->pmtu);
00194 
00195                     sctpEV3 << "\t=>\tsst=" << path->ssthresh << " cwnd=" << path->cwnd << endl;
00196                 recordCwndUpdate(path);
00197                 path->partialBytesAcked =
00198                     ((path->cwnd < path->partialBytesAcked) ?
00199                         (path->partialBytesAcked - path->cwnd) : 0);
00200             }
00201 
00202             // ------ No need to increase Congestion Window -------------------
00203             else {
00204                 sctpEV3 << simTime() << ":\tCC "
00205                         << "Not increasing cwnd of path " << path->remoteAddress << " in congestion avoidance: "
00206                         << "ctsnaAdvanced="       << ((ctsnaAdvanced == true) ? "yes" : "no") << "\t"
00207                         << "cwnd="                    << path->cwnd                              << "\t"
00208                         << "ssthresh="                << path->ssthresh                          << "\t"
00209                         << "ackedBytes="              << ackedBytes                              << "\t"
00210                         << "pathOsbBeforeUpdate=" << path->outstandingBytesBeforeUpdate << "\t"
00211                         << "pathOsb="                 << path->outstandingBytes              << "\t"
00212                         << "(pathOsbBeforeUpdate >= path->cwnd)="
00213                             << (path->outstandingBytesBeforeUpdate >= path->cwnd)            << "\t"
00214                         << "partialBytesAcked="   << path->partialBytesAcked                 << "\t"
00215                         << "(path->partialBytesAcked >= path->cwnd)="
00216                             << (path->partialBytesAcked >= path->cwnd) << endl;
00217             }
00218         }
00219 
00220         // ====== Reset PartialBytesAcked counter if no more outstanding bytes
00221         if(path->outstandingBytes == 0) {
00222             path->partialBytesAcked = 0;
00223         }
00224     }
00225     else {
00226         sctpEV3 << simTime() << ":\tCC "
00227                 << "Not increasing cwnd of path " << path->remoteAddress
00228                 << " during Fast Recovery" << endl;
00229     }
00230 }
00231 
00232 
00233 void SCTPAssociation::cwndUpdateAfterRtxTimeout(SCTPPathVariables* path)
00234 {
00235         sctpEV3 << simTime() << ":\tCC [cwndUpdateAfterRtxTimeout]\t" << path->remoteAddress
00236                     << "\tsst=" << path->ssthresh << " cwnd=" << path->cwnd;
00237 
00238         path->ssthresh = (int32)max(path->cwnd / 2, 4 * path->pmtu);
00239         path->cwnd = path->pmtu;
00240 
00241         sctpEV3 << "\t=>\tsst=" << path->ssthresh << " cwnd=" << path->cwnd << endl;
00242     path->partialBytesAcked         = 0;
00243     recordCwndUpdate(path);
00244 
00245     // Leave Fast Recovery mode
00246     if (path->fastRecoveryActive == true) {
00247         path->fastRecoveryActive     = false;
00248         path->fastRecoveryExitPoint = 0;
00249     }
00250 }

00252 
00253 void SCTPAssociation::cwndUpdateMaxBurst(SCTPPathVariables* path)
00254 {
00255         if(path->cwnd > ((path->outstandingBytes + state->maxBurst * path->pmtu))) {
00256             sctpEV3 << simTime()      << ":\tCC [cwndUpdateMaxBurst]\t" << path->remoteAddress
00257                     << "\tsst="       << path->ssthresh << " cwnd=" << path->cwnd
00258                     << "\tosb="       << path->outstandingBytes
00259                     << "\tmaxBurst=" << state->maxBurst * path->pmtu << endl;
00260 
00261             path->cwnd = path->outstandingBytes + (state->maxBurst * path->pmtu);
00262             recordCwndUpdate(path);
00263 
00264             sctpEV3 << "\t=>\tsst=" << path->ssthresh << " cwnd=" << path->cwnd << endl;
00265         }
00266 }
00267 
00268 
00269 void SCTPAssociation::cwndUpdateAfterCwndTimeout(SCTPPathVariables* path)
00270 {
00271     // When the association does not transmit data on a given transport address
00272     // within an RTO, the cwnd of the transport address SHOULD be adjusted to 2*MTU.
00273 
00274         sctpEV3 << simTime() << ":\tCC [cwndUpdateAfterCwndTimeout]\t" << path->remoteAddress
00275                   << "\tsst=" << path->ssthresh << " cwnd=" << path->cwnd;
00276         path->cwnd = (int32)min(4 * path->pmtu, max(2 * path->pmtu, 4380));
00277         sctpEV3 << "\t=>\tsst=" << path->ssthresh << " cwnd=" << path->cwnd << endl;
00278     recordCwndUpdate(path);
00279 }
